author: The Editorial Board
title: Saving the Eurozone From the Virus - The Wall Street Journal
description: Saving the Eurozone From the Virus The Wall Street Journal EU Finance Ministers Reach $590 Billion Coronavirus Rescue Deal NPR Europe has a rescue package. But who's going to pay for its coronavirus recovery? CNN Italy Will Struggle to Sell the EU Rescue Deal…
content:
Eurozone finance ministers late Thursday saved the currency bloc from Covid-19at least for now. They rolled out economic supports worth about 540 billion. More important, they didnt create new eurobonds on the fly in a crisis without democratic support.
This… [+273 chars]
